Anyone with a few extra $$ in theri pocket should toddle over to 

http://www.kurotokagi.com/

Where most everything is on sale for $10 including When the Last Sword
is Drawn/Mibu Gishi Den

There are also quite a few non samurai films featuring some of our
favorite "Shinsengumi actors" like Jo Odagiri, Shosuke Tanihara,
Tatsuya Fujiwara and even Gohatto's creepy Kano-- Ryuhei Matsuda.

I highly recommend Sky High, Makai Tensho, 1/47-Chushingura and Battle
Royale #1

If you have a lot of extra $$$ you can even pick up the entire NHK
Shinsengumi series for $120.

Barb Sheridan
